title: S2 Toplaner LF duo
body: Long story short I've been bouncing between S1 and S2 for a while now, I'm keen to finally reach gold. Ideally I'd like a jungler I can trust (as in getting mid and bot rolling while I receive enemy jg pressure)  but also don't mind a compitant midlaner. I'm pre chill and laid back, don't flame. (Voice chat is optional)

replies.body: Hello kwin, if your interested in finding a group to play with come check out http://discord.gg/Y93kJJN. Discord is full of players constantly looking for teams/players to queue norms and ranked matches.
